name: clash-royale-3d-clone
description: A full-featured 3D tower defense game inspired by Clash Royale

scripts.install:all: npm run install:backend && npm run install:frontend
scripts.setup: npm run install:all && npm run db:migrate && npm run db:seed
scripts.start: concurrently "npm run dev:backend" "npm run dev:socket" "npm run dev:frontend"
